column4: Stakeholder alignment complete and project charter signed

Platform deployed on EKS with VCS integration functional
All workspaces migrated with state validation complete
40 policies enforced across all workspaces with 100% compliance

Full platform operational with self-service and governance enabled
Launch project and align on objectives
